def radix_sort(arr):

    def counting_sort(arr, exp1):
        n = len(arr)
        output = [0] * n
        count = [0] * 10
        for i in range(0, n):
            index = arr[i] // exp1
            count[index % 10] += 1
        for i in range(1, 10):
            count[i] += count[i - 1]
        i = n - 1
        while i >= 0:
            index = arr[i] // exp1
            output[count[index % 10] - 1] = arr[i]
            count[index % 10] -= 1
            i -= 1
        for i in range(0, len(arr)):
            arr[i] = output[i]
    max1 = max(arr)
    exp = 2
    while max1 / exp > 0:
        counting_sort(arr, exp)
        exp *= 10
    return arr
